q0.question: After accepting what, Jabez is quickly lavished with all he had ever dreamed of?
q0.recall: After accepting the deal, Jabez is quickly lavished with all he had ever dreamed of.
q0.vectordb: After accepting the deal, Jabez is quickly lavished with all he had ever dreamed of. He receives a book deal, money, women, notoriety, and overall success. However, despite the material wealth, he starts losing the friendship, respect, and trust of those around him. He realizes that he didn't quite get everything he bargained for and begs the Devil to release him from their deal. When the Devil refuses, Jabez turns to famed orator Daniel Webster, and they decide to take the battle to court in an otherworldly trial against the Devil to fight for the fate of Jabez's soul.
